title: Final Cut Pro (MAS) - 10.1 [Intel]
description:
Completely redesigned from the ground up, Final Cut Pro adds extraordinary speed, quality, and flexibility to every part of the post-production workflow.


Revolutionary Video Editing 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Assemble clips in the Magnetic Timeline without clip collisions or sync problems
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Use Clip Connections to attach B-roll, sound effects, and music to the timeline
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Reduce clutter by grouping clips into a Compound Clip. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Perfect your pacing right in the timeline with the Inline Precision Editor
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Cycle through different shots, graphics, or effects at one place in the timeline with Auditions
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Edit multi-camera projects with automatic sync and support for up to 64 camera angles

Powerful Media Organization 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Organize your work within libraries for efficient media management and collaboration
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Work natively with a broad range of formats including RED, AVCHD, H.264 from DSLRs, and mor
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Content Auto-Analysis captures camera metadata and analyzes shots in the background
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Create and apply custom keywords on the fly as you select ranges in clips
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Smart Collections let you dynamically organize content and find any shot in a few clicks

Incredible Performance 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Final Cut Pro uses all the GPUs in your Mac for superior real-time playback performance and fast background renderin
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ 64-bit architecture uses all the RAM in your system for larger projects and richer effects
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Background processing lets you keep working without interruption
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ External monitoring lets you route video and audio through HDMI or third-party Thunderbolt and PCIe devices

Compelling, Customizable Effects 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Preview effects to see how they look with your footage before applying them
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Change the look of titles, transitions, and effects using intuitive controls
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Control effects with precision using a keyframe editor that appears directly in the timeline
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Use third-party FxPlug plug-ins with custom interfaces and dual-GPU support

Integrated Audio Editing 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Expand and edit multichannel audio files directly in the timeline
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Let Final Cut Pro repair significant audio problems such as hum, excessive noise, and more
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Sync DSLR video with separate audio in a single step, with instant audio waveform matching

Intuitive Color Grading 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Improve the look of any clip with the single-click Balance Color feature
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Apply the Match Color feature to match the looks of two clips shot under different conditions
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Manipulate color, saturation, and exposure with the Color Board
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Fine tune color for a specific color range or area of the screen using keying and masks

One-Step, Optimized Output 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Deliver projects for playback on Apple devices and websites such as Vimeo, YouTube, and Facebook
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Use themed menus to quickly author and burn a DVD or Blu-ray disc
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Export customized audio stems and multiple versions of a finished video using Roles metadata
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Import and export XML to support third-party workflows

System Requirements: OS X v10.9 or later, 4GB of RAM (8GB recommended for 4K), OpenCL-capable graphics card or Intel HD Graphics 3000 or later, 256MB of VRAM (1GB recommended for 4K), 3.5GB of disk space.

Some features require Internet access; additional fees may apply. Blu-ray recorder required for burning Blu-ray discs.


Whats New in Version 10.1
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Optimized playback and rendering using dual GPUs in the new Mac Pro
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Video monitoring up to 4K via Thunderbolt 2 and HDMI on select Mac computers
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ 4K content including titles, transitions, and generators
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Libraries allow you to gather multiple events and projects within a single bundle
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Easily open and close individual libraries to load just the material you need
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Option to import media to locations inside or outside a library
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Automatically back up libraries to a user-specified drive or network location
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Project Snapshots let you quickly capture the project state for fast versioning
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Audio fade handles on individual audio channels in the timeline
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Add precise retime speeds by entering them numerically in the timeline
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Non-rippling retime option
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ One-step Replace and Retime
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Custom project frame sizes
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Through edits displayed on all clip types
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Join Through Edit command removes bladed cuts to clips in the timeline
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Detach audio from Multicam Clips in the timeline to manipulate audio and video separately
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Make video or audio-only edits into the timeline with Multicam Clips as sources
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Blade and move audio in J- and L-cuts
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Roll audio with J- and L-cut splits open
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Option to hide the Browser to gain more screen space for viewing
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Native support for .MTS and .MT2S files from AVCHD cameras
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Used media indicators on source clips
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Improved performance with large projects
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Improved performance when modifying or adding keywords to many clips at once
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Easily move, copy, and paste multiple keyframes
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Option for linear animation with Ken Burns effect
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Improved image stabilization with InertiaCam and Tripod mode
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Import photos from iOS devices
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Proxy and playback quality controls accessible in Viewer menu
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Support for portrait/landscape metadata in still images
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Effects parameters, fonts, and text size included in XML metadata
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Improved support for growing media and edit while ingest
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ FxPlug 3 with custom plug-in interfaces and dual-GPU support
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ API for custom Share operations using third-party software
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Share directly to YouTube at 4K resolution
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Share directly to Chinese video sites Youku and Tudou
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Spanish language localization
